nodes.bodyText: can ESCAPE be a multi-char string ?
nope, Greenplum only support single character for the escape character
wouldn't this be a problem for non-CSV tables where there's no delimiter ?
good point. It looks like it isn't as all the tests are passing, but I'd like to understand why the tests are passing. I will get back to you on this
It turns out that the default CSV/TEXT options are still passed from the C side even with 'CUSTOM' format type. I added an if guarding the checks.
